OrgName.entry: MENTAL HEALTH DIVERSION AND LIAISON SCHEME

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Health and Social Care NHS Foundation Trust. Offers support to people with mental health issues who have been arrested or who are in the criminal justice system. For young people aged over 18 years. Referral via police, court, probation service or self referral. Support provided by mental health nurses.

Langs.entry: Interpreters available via police or court service
